agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Higher Education TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Turner HB 1101 Darby Relating to the name of the Southwest Collegiate Institute for the Deaf. HB 60 Ortega | et al. Relating to a requirement that public institutions of higher education provide certain information regarding certain women's health programs to students. HB 271 Bernal | et al. Relating to student access of career school and college transcripts and certificates of completion of training. HB 844 Guillen Relating to a limitation on the amount of a fee charged by a public institution of higher education for the issuance of an official transcript. HB 1180 Guillen Relating to the agreement requirements for receiving a scholarship under the Texas Armed Services Scholarship Program. HB 1065 Ashby Relating to the establishment of a rural resident physician grant program. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 57 HB 66 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
